item.title: Forecasting Stocks and Commodity Prices
item.description: Trend observed for International Business Machines Corporation About Financial services are classified into three broad segment: Consumer finance Capital market Diversified financial services. Stock markets are the non-banking segment belonging to diversified financial services. Problem Statement The stock market appears in news every day. The rate of investment opportunities in the stock market can increase if an efficient algorithm could be devised to predict the short term price of an individual stock.

item.title: Retail Analytics

item.title: Financial Analytics
item.description: About Loan default prediction is one of the most critical and crucial problem faced by financial institutions and organizations as it has a noteworthy effect on the probability of these institutions. Problem Statement A company wants to automate the loan eligibility process(real time) based on customer detail provided while filling online application form. These details are Gender, Marital status, Education, Number of dependents, Income, Loan amount, Credit history etc.

item.title: Machine Learning in Banking
item.description: Variation exists in all processes, understanding and reducing variation are keys to success. Financial industry consists of Banking and Non-banking, with focus to banking we have the following below: Consumer lending E-payment Business lending In view of the project associated with the case study used is consumer lending to determine the credit worthiness of consumers, where lenders use various factors such as credit score, annual income, the loan amount approved, tenure, debt to income ratio etc, and then select your interest rates.

item.title: Business Analytics
item.description: About RFM Recency (R) = Time since last purchase Frequency(F) = Total number of purchase Monetary value (M) = Total monetary values Each corresponding to some key customer trait. These metrics are important indicators of customer’s behaviour because frequency and monetary value affects a customer’s lifetime value and recency affects retention a measure of engagement. RFM factors illustrate these facts: The more recent the purchase the more responsive the customer is to promotions.
